compositions.description:
Test the Pen-Tool's CLICK-AND-HOLD behavior to:
(1) LMB-DOWN: Place Vertex.
(2) LMB-DOWN + DRAG: Move Bezier Control Point.
(3) RELEASE LMB: Finalize Vertex Placement.
